Issue.creator: mfford
Issue.summary: Design network routing to a particular validator
Issue.description: It should be possible to send a message to a particular validator on the network, using knowledge about the validator's peers and those peers' peers. After this story there would be a design for how to identify a particular validator on the network, how much of the network topology information would be needed to be kept by any one validator, and what that information would look like, and how to use that information to route a message to a particular validator.
